channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families tell how eating meals together brought them closer each other and to the Eucharist, and helped form them as individuals. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch, Fr. Andrew Hofer, and FR. Philip Nolan discuss what St. Thomas Aquinas called, ?the most perfect of prayers,? the Our Father, and how it can fulfill our ache for hope. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig explains from where the longing for rootedness and a sense of belonging stems and also explores how the homesteading movement can aid a family create lasting community. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. James Dominic Brent sits down with Fr. Mark during the SEEK conference in Salt Lake City to discuss the merciful love of God our Father and ways to live in union with Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Albanie, Metano?a
channel.desc: Un pays, qui a connu l?une des dictatures communistes les plus fanatiques et ath?es, rena?t gr?ce ? la foi d?Albanais forts et d?vou?s. Aujourd?hui, le travail et le d?vouement des femmes consacr?es fournissent l??nergie vitale qui nourrit la vie de l??glise. ? M?tano?a ? pr?sente l?histoire inspirante de six religieuses qui partagent leurs exp?riences de missionnaires de la foi, ramenant l??vangile sur ces terres. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris Alar, M.I.C. helps viewers get a better understanding of the Divine Mercy message, and shares powerful, real life examples of people who live Divine Mercy in their every day lives. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Holy Spirit, discerning a religious order or diocesan priesthood, and the significance of destroying the ring of a deceased pope. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! The Melkite Church In America
channel.desc: Bishop John Elya explores the rich traditions and history of the Melkite Catholic Church in America. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: EWTN foundress Mother Angelica lends her valuable insight into the subject of conscience - why we have it, and what we do with it. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Matthew Bunson joins to expand upon Pope Leo XIV, his life, beliefs, and what the selection of his name might indicate about this impact on the Church and the world in general. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna visits London Bridge, Shakespeare's Globe Theatre and where the ancient church of St. Mary Overie stood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! In Concert: 21st International Festival Of Sacred Music And Art Universal Vespers
channel.desc: Andrea Mannucci?s Universal Vespers, inspired by Pope Francis? 2020 prayer in an empty St. Peter?s Square. Directed by Claude Villaret at the Basilica of St. John Lateran in Rome. (45 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crux
channel.desc: Bishop Donald Hying encourages viewers to live in the quiet of the moment in order to better hear and understand God?s plan for their lives. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen emphasizes that the most intimate presence of God is in the Holy Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Two Marian apparitions in Rome are the subject of today?s investigation. One miracle leads to the building of St. Mary Major, and the other a dramatic conversion when an anti-Catholic Jew wears a Mary Miraculous Medal. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On Good Soil
channel.desc: Jason Craig explains from where the longing for rootedness and a sense of belonging stems and also explores how the homesteading movement can aid a family create lasting community. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).
